name: MetaQR
summary: MetaQR is for AVCaptureMetadataOutputObjectsDelegate new feature with iOS 7+ for scan QR Codes
description: MetaQR is for AVCaptureMetadataOutputObjectsDelegate new feature with iOS 7+ for scan QR Codes. From this MetaQR you can just drag & drop MetaQR files to your project & configure your project accordingly.
